items.name: Object_Timer
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_Timer
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_Timer extends gs.Object_Base
    @objectCodecBlackList = ["parent"]
    
    ###*
    * A timer object. A timer can be used as a regular timer or as a stop-watch.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Object_Timer
    * @extends gs.Object_Base
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super()
        
        ###*
        * The current seconds.
        * @property seconds
        * @type number
        ###
        @seconds = 0
        
        ###*
        * The current minutes.
        * @property seconds
        * @type number
        ###
        @minutes = 0
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the timer runs like a stop-watch.
        * @property stopWatch
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @stopWatch = no
        
        ###*
        * A behavior-component to add timer-specific behavior to the object.
        * @property behavior
        * @type gs.Component_Timer
        ###
        @behavior = null
        
        ###*
        * An event-emitter to emit events.
        * @property events
        * @type gs.Component_EventEmitter
        ###
        @events = new gs.EventEmitter()
        
        @addComponent(@events)
        
        if data?
            @componentsFromDataBundle(data)
        else
            @behavior = new gs.Component_Timer()
            @addComponent(@behavior)
        
    ###*
    * Serializes the object into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    * @return {Object} The data-bundle.
    ###    
    toDataBundle: ->
        components = @componentsToDataBundle(gs.Component_Timer)
                
        result = {
            stopWatch: @stopWatch,
            minutes: @minutes,
            seconds: @seconds,
            components: components
        }
    
        return result
        
    restore: (dataBundle) ->
        
        
    
        
gs.Object_Timer = Object_Timer
